TriggerOraclev10g.name: SNAP$COMM_MASTER
TriggerOraclev10g.body:
declare dmltype char;
begin
IF DBMS_REPUTIL.FROM_REMOTE = FALSE THEN
if inserting then dmltype := 'I';
INSERT INTO "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER"
(PROCESS_NO ,YEAR ,DEPARTMENT_NO ,TELLEGRAM_NO,
TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
TELLEGRAM_TIME ,SUBJECT ,IN_ACCOMPANIED ,INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
DEPT_CLASS ,SEC_LEVEL ,OLD_INCOMMING ,BARQ_TYPE,
COUNTRY_CODE ,CITY_CODE ,IN_OUT_CODE ,IN_DATE_DD,
IN_DATE_MM ,IN_DATE_YY ,DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,USER_ID,
SADER_NO, YEAR_SADER, WARED_SEC, DOC_TYPE, ID_NUMBER, INDEX_CODE,DEPT_CODE, FINISHED,
INTERY_DATE, ACTION_CODE, CREATE_DATE)
VALUES
(:NEW.PROCESS_NO ,:NEW.YEAR ,:NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO ,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_NO,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY,:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TYPE,
:NEW.TELLEGRAM_TIME ,:NEW.SUBJECT ,:NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,:NEW.INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
:NEW.DEPT_CLASS ,:NEW.SEC_LEVEL ,:NEW.OLD_INCOMMING ,:NEW.BARQ_TYPE,
:NEW.COUNTRY_CODE ,:NEW.CITY_CODE ,:NEW.IN_OUT_CODE ,:NEW.IN_DATE_DD,
:NEW.IN_DATE_MM ,:NEW.IN_DATE_YY ,:NEW.DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,:NEW.USER_ID,
:NEW.SADER_NO ,:NEW.YEAR_SADER ,:NEW.WARED_SEC ,:NEW.DOC_TYPE ,:NEW.ID_NUMBER ,:NEW.INDEX_CODE ,:NEW.DEPT_CODE ,:NEW.FINISHED ,:NEW.INTERY_DATE ,:NEW.ACTION_CODE ,:NEW.CREATE_DATE);
elsif updating then dmltype := 'U';
update "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER"
SET DEPARTMENT_NO = :NEW.DEPARTMENT_NO ,TELLEGRAM_NO = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_NO ,
TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_DD ,TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_MM ,TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_DATE_YY ,
TELLEGRAM_TYPE = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_TYPE, TELLEGRAM_TIME = :NEW.TELLEGRAM_TIME ,SUBJECT = :NEW.SUBJECT
,IN_ACCOMPANIED = :NEW.IN_ACCOMPANIED ,INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE = :NEW.INCOMMING_DIRECTORATE,
DEPT_CLASS = :NEW.DEPT_CLASS ,SEC_LEVEL = :NEW.SEC_LEVEL ,OLD_INCOMMING =:NEW.OLD_INCOMMING ,
BARQ_TYPE = :NEW.BARQ_TYPE, COUNTRY_CODE = :NEW.COUNTRY_CODE ,CITY_CODE =:NEW.CITY_CODE ,
IN_OUT_CODE = :NEW.IN_OUT_CODE ,IN_DATE_DD = :NEW.IN_DATE_DD, IN_DATE_MM =:NEW.IN_DATE_MM,
IN_DATE_YY =:NEW.IN_DATE_YY ,DIRECTRATE_TYPE = :NEW.DIRECTRATE_TYPE ,USER_ID= :NEW.USER_ID, SADER_NO = :NEW.SADER_NO
, YEAR_SADER=:NEW.YEAR_SADER , WARED_SEC = :NEW.WARED_SEC , DOC_TYPE = :NEW.DOC_TYPE, ID_NUMBER= :NEW.ID_NUMBER
, INDEX_CODE= :NEW.INDEX_CODE ,DEPT_CODE= :NEW.DEPT_CODE, FINISHED = :NEW.FINISHED, INTERY_DATE = :NEW.INTERY_DATE
, ACTION_CODE = :NEW.ACTION_CODE, CREATE_DATE = :NEW.CREATE_DATE
WHERE PROCESS_NO=:OLD.PROCESS_NO
AND YEAR =:OLD.YEAR ;
elsif deleting then dmltype := 'D';
DELETE "OSD"."SNAP$COMM_MASTER"
WHERE PROCESS_NO=:OLD.PROCESS_NO
AND YEAR =:OLD.YEAR;
end if;
END IF;
end;
